page.title: 07Folklore & Legend - Dartmoor
page.content:
{Supernatural}
The Wisht Hounds - This story originates from Wistmans Wood and has many variations. It is said that they are led by Dewer, the devil himself, and are known to gallop around the moor on dark nights. According to one version they are supposed to be the souls of young, unbaptised babies who had died. Known as "chrisoms", they now roam the moor hunting the devil himself.
According to tradition, anybody who sees the hounds on a hunt will die within one year, and anyone who follows them will be lured to a nasty end!
The hounds are reported to be jet black, like the devil himself.
